title: ‘Customized tech-led solution for unlocking growth potential of micro enterprises is need of the hour’ - The Financial Express
content: ‘Customized tech-led solution for unlocking growth potential of micro enterprises is need of the hour’  The Financial Express
description: Credit and Finance for MSMEs: While the entrepreneurship landscape at large is increasingly becoming aware of their significance and potential in urban & metro towns, rural micro-enterprises are still unable to integrate seamlessly with finance, distribution and mechanization services.
